name: Chunghwan Kim
content: Chung Hwan Kim Chung Hwan Kim (김충환) Assistant Professor, Department of Computer Science, University of Texas at Dallas 800 W. Campbell Road, MS EC31, Richardson, TX 75080–3021 email / ECSS 3.201 CV / Google Scholar / ORCID / GitLab Software & Systems Security Laboratory (S3 Lab) I am an Assistant Professor in the Department of Computer Science at UT Dallas, where I lead the S3 Lab. I have been honored with an NSF CAREER Award, a UT Dallas New Faculty Research Symposium Grant award, and recognition as a top 10 finalist for the CSAW Best Applied Research Paper Award. I am actively seeking motivated students to join my research group. If you are interested, please visit this page for more information. Research Interests Computer Systems Security, Cyber-Physical Security, Software Security and Reliability Teaching [ recent / all ] Operating Systems Concepts (CS/SE 4348): Fall 2025, Fall 2024, Fall 2023, Fall 2022 Software & Systems Security Seminar: Fall 2025, Spring 2025, Fall 2024, Summer 2024, Spring 2024, Summer 2023, Summer 2022, Spring 2021 Information Security (CS 6324): Spring 2025, Spring 2024, Spring 2023, Spring 2022, Spring 2021 Special Topics in Computer Science - Security of CPS & IoT Systems (CS 6301): Fall 2021, Fall 2020 Publications [ recent / all ] 2026 DNN Latency Sequencing: Extracting DNN Architectures from Intel SGX Enclaves with Single-Stepping Attacks paper code bibtex Minkyung Park, Zelun Kong, Dave (Jing) Tian, Z.
